about_the_game:
Can you imagine a perfect world without traffic jams, with high performance interchanges and with optimized traffic flow?
It works, just create your own smart solutions as a traffic engineer!

“Tiny Road Interchanges” is a game which allows you to simulate the flow of traffic by building efficient intersections and using your creativity without limits.

Simulate the optimal course of the road, develop tiny road interchanges, and let your imagination go.
Have fun!
detailed_description:
Can you imagine a perfect world without traffic jams, with high performance interchanges and with optimized traffic flow?
It works, just create your own smart solutions as a traffic engineer!

“Tiny Road Interchanges” is a game which allows you to simulate the flow of traffic by building efficient intersections and using your creativity without limits.

Simulate the optimal course of the road, develop tiny road interchanges, and let your imagination go.
Have fun!
name: Tiny Road Interchanges

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD3000 or higher with OpenGL 2.1 support
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: with OpenAL support
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM

short_description: Create tiny road interchanges as a traffic engineer. Be as creative as possible, simulate the traffic flow and create efficient interchanges.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian
